DIA_Weirdo_Weirdohello_03_02: Don't happen to have a back scratcher with you?
DIA_Weirdo_Weirdohello_15_04: But maybe this arm will do?
DIA_Weirdo_Weirdohello_03_06: That's exactly what I had in mind! Thanks!
DIA_Weirdo_Weirdohello_15_07: I don't think I have anything like that on me.
DIA_Weirdo_Scratcher_03_01: If you find a scratcher let me know!
DIA_Weirdo_Scratcher2_03_01: Oh I see you have a perfect scratcher with you!
DIA_Weirdo_AmbientTalk_03_02: I don't have any more business to attend to!
